queries.query: What year was The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild released?
queries.response: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild was released in 2017. This information is confirmed from the database entry for the game, which states the release year as 2017.

queries.query: When was Breath of the Wild released?
queries.response: "The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild" was released in 2017 on the Nintendo Switch. This game is widely recognized for revolutionizing the Zelda franchise with its open-world design, physics-based puzzles, and exploration mechanics (source: db_results).

Elden Ring was released on **February 25, 2022**. This action role-playing game was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment and developed by FromSoftware, featuring contributions from writer George R.R. Martin. It is noted for its open-world design and gameplay similar to the Dark Souls series (source: [Simple English Wikipedia](https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elden_Ring), [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elden_Ring)).

Hades is available on several platforms, including **Nintendo Switch**, macOS, Windows, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, and iOS. It was initially released for Nintendo Switch and Windows on September 17, 2020, after an early access phase that started in December 2018. Subsequent releases for other platforms followed in August 2021 and March 2024 for iOS through Netflix Games (Wikipedia, 2023).
